title: LF D5+ TOP MAIN for ranked 5s
body:
Hey guys, Vital Gaming Alpha is Looking for a TOP LANE MAIN for ranked teams to replace our inactive top lane player.
Must be available to play 2-4 days a week however we will use that to schedule practice games maybe 2 days a week.
Would prefer if you are Diamond or higher due to the level of our team and our goal to hit challenger by end of season.

We will work hard when we do play but we won't overload you with practice so don't worry about being drowned out of your real life commitments. We are looking for players who can stick around for a long time however, as this organisation is trying to extend it's Esports professional teams to include League of Legends.

Please comment below as my friends list is maxed, I will contact you if you make an effort to show your interest.

P.S. Don't add Wiffle either

replies.body: Hey man I'm a Diamond 4 top laner, if you could chuck me an add that would be great.
master tier top laner here defo keen.
Im interested. Add this account when you can
I sent you a friend request, awaiting on your acceptance so we can discuss your interest further.

Yo i'm a d5 top laner highest in season was d2 , play all top lane champs to a high lvl and some champs even further

have a very flexible timetable too
